mapper.sql: Name, EvaluationPerson, EvaluationTime, Question1, Comment1, Question2, Comment2, Question3, Comment3, Question4, Comment4, Question5, Comment5 , Question6, Comment6 , Question7, Comment7 , Question8, Comment8 , Question9, Comment9 , Question10, Comment10 , Question11, Comment11 , Question12, Comment12 , Question13, Comment13 , Question14, Comment14 , Question15, Comment15 , Question16, Comment17 , Question18, Comment18 , Question19, Comment19 , Question20, Comment20 , Question21, Comment21, Question22, Comment22, Question23, Comment23, Question24, Comment24 , Question25, Comment26 , Question27, Comment27, Question28, Comment28, Question29, Comment29, Question30, Comment30, Question31, Comment31, Question32, Comment32, Question33, Comment33 , Question34, Comment34, Question35, Comment35, Question36, Comment36, Question37, Comment37, Question38, Comment38, Question39, Comment39, Question40, Comment40, Question41, Comment41, Question42, Comment42, Question43, Comment43, Question44, Comment44, Question45, Comment45, Question46, Comment46, Question47, Comment47, Question48, Comment48, Question49, Comment49, Question50, Comment50, Question51, Comment51, Question52, Comment52, Question53, Comment53, Question54, Comment54, Question55, Comment55, Question56, Comment56, Question57, Comment57
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO test.StudyForm_Teacher(NAME, Age, Sex, Class, School, Organization, EvaluationPerson, EvaluationTime, Question1, Question2, Question3, Question4, Question5, Question6, Question7, Question8, Question9, Question10, Question11, Question12, Question13, Question14, Question15, Question16, Question17, Question18) VALUES (#{name}, #{age}, #{sex}, #{banji}, #{school}, #{organization}, #{evaluationPerson}, #{evaluationTime}, #{Question1}, #{Question2}, #{Question3}, #{Question4}, #{Question5}, #{Question6}, #{Question7}, #{Question8}, #{Question9}, #{Question10}, #{Question11}, #{Question12}, #{Question13}, #{Question14}, #{Question15}, #{Question16}, #{Question17}, #{Question18});
